item.title: Path-enhanced Explainable Recommendation with Knowledge Graphs
item.description: This paper is early rejected by IJCAI 2020 with 1a, 1wa, 1wr, 1r and CIKM 2020 with 1wa, 1r, 1wr.

item.title: lmaxRPCls: An Algorithm Utilizing Light Symmetry for Approximating maxRPC in Constraint Programming
More about me
item.description: I am an extrovert and have a very easy-going attitude to life. In my spare time, I always jog, swim, and play computer games with my friends. Sometimes I would participate in competitions such as a miniMarathon: I can play several Chinese traditional musical instruments like the bamboo flute and hulusi. Recently I’m learning how to play the guitar and ukulele. Hope I can play a complete tune before graduation. I am also a rookie in painting, you can find some of my works in gallery.
